mapper.select: SELECT ipn.user_id, ipn.txn_id, ipn.payer_email, ipn.payer_first_name, ipn.payer_last_name, ipn.payer_phone, ipn.payment_status, ipn.payment_date, ipn.mc_gross, ipn.mc_fee, ipn.txn_type, ipn.mc_currency, dp.step, dp.message, dp.step_date FROM paypal_ipn_transaction ipn LEFT JOIN donation_progress dp ON ipn.txn_id = dp.txn_id ORDER BY ipn.payment_date DESC
SELECT step, message, step_date FROM donation_progress WHERE txn_id = #{txnId} ORDER BY step ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation_progress (txn_id, step, message, step_date) VALUES (#{txnId}, #{step}, #{message}, #{stepDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE message = VALUES(message), step_date = VALUES(step_date)
